trans-unit.source: An abstract WCF extension class for specifying a custom discovery service or for getting the published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 추상 WCF 확장명 클래스 사용자 지정 검색 서비스를 지정 하거나 게시 된 끝점을 가져오기 위한입니다.

trans-unit.source: Derive a class from DiscoveryServiceExtension and override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> method to return your custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: DiscoveryServiceExtension 및 재정의에서 클래스를 파생 된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>메서드를 사용자 지정 검색 서비스를 반환 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add your derived class to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> extensions that host your discoverable service.
trans-unit.target: 추가 하려면 파생된 클래스는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>검색 가능한 서비스를 호스트 하는 확장입니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A> is called the behavior iterates through the extensions in the service host and looks for a DiscoveryServiceExtension.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>라고 동작이 서비스 호스트에 확장을 반복 하 고는 DiscoveryServiceExtension을 찾습니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If one is found its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> is called to get the custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: 가 있는 경우 해당 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>사용자 지정 검색 서비스 가져오기 위해 호출 됩니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an extension is not found the default discovery service implementation is used.
trans-unit.target: 확장이 발견 되지 않으면 기본 검색 서비스 구현이 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension"></xref> class.
Override this method to return your custom <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정을 반환 하려면이 메서드를 재정의 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"> </xref> 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown while opening the service host if this method returns `null`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>이 메서드가 반환 하는 경우 서비스 호스트를 여는 동안 예외가 `null` </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 게시 된 끝점의 읽기 전용 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The property should be accessed only after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> has successfully opened.

When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> is in <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> is being generated and added to the collection.
A read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 게시 된 끝점의 읽기 전용 컬렉션입니다.
